text: Provision of Skilled People
And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,
“See, I have called by name\f + \fr 31:2 \ft In other words, “specifically chosen” \f* Bezalel the son of Uri the son of Hur, from the tribe of Judah.

And I have filled him \add with\add* the Spirit of God, with wisdom and with skill\f + \fr 31:3 \ft Or “understanding,” “discernment,” “cleverness” \f* and with knowledge and with every \add kind of\add* craftsmanship,
to devise designs, to work with gold and with silver and with bronze,
and in stonecutting for setting and in cutting wood, for doing every \add kind of\add* craftsmanship.

And, look, I have given with him Oholiab the son of Ahisamach, from the tribe of Dan, and I have put skill in the heart of all \add the\add* skilled of heart, and they will make all that I have commanded you—
the tent of assembly and the ark of the testimony and the atonement cover that \add is\add* on it and all the equipment of the tent,
and the table and all its equipment, and the pure \add gold\add* lampstand and all its equipment, and the incense altar,
and the altar of burnt offering and all its equipment, and the basin and its stand,

and the garments of woven material, and ⸤the garments of the sanctuary⸥\f + \fr 31:10 \ft Literally “the garments of the holiness” or “the holy garments” \f* for Aaron the priest and the garments of his sons to serve as priests,
and the anointing oil and the fragrant incense for the sanctuary. According to all that I have commanded you, they will make \add it\add*.
Provision of Rest from Work
And Yahweh spoke to Moses \add and\add* said,

“And you, speak to the ⸤Israelites⸥,\f + \fr 31:13 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* saying, ‘Surely you must keep my Sabbaths, because it \add is\add* a sign between me and you throughout your generations, \add in order\add* to know that I \add am\add* Yahweh, who consecrates you.

And you must keep the Sabbath, because it is holy for you; defilers\f + \fr 31:14 \ft Or “profaners,” those who treat it as common \f* of it will surely be put to death, because anyone who does work on it—that person will be cut off from among his people.

\add On\add* six days work can be done, and on the seventh ⸤is a Sabbath of complete rest⸥,\f + \fr 31:15 \ft Literally “a Sabbath of ‘Sabbathation.’ ” “Sabbathation” is not a real word, but devised as an attempt to convey the sounds of the related nouns in the Hebrew phrase \f* ⸤a holy day⸥\f + \fr 31:15 \ft Literally “holiness” \f* for Yahweh; anyone doing work on the Sabbath day will surely be put to death.

The ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 31:16 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* will pay attention to the Sabbath \add in order\add* to fulfill the Sabbath\f + \fr 31:16 \ft Or “keep the Sabbath to do/observe the Sabbath” \f* throughout their generations \add as\add* a lasting covenant.

It \add is\add* a sign between me and the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 31:17 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* forever, because \add in\add* six days Yahweh made the heavens and the earth, and on the seventh he ceased\f + \fr 31:17 \ft Or “rested” \f* and recovered.”\f + \fr 31:17 \ft Or “breathed freely,” “got his breath” \f*
And when he finished speaking with him on Mount Sinai, he gave to Moses the two tablets of the testimony, stone tablets, written with the finger of God.
